First of all, i want to say thanks to Wuby986 and Daxgirl, two super smart devs. This Rom Control comes from them, from their source and from their guidance.

Huge thanks also to:
Goldie, tdunham, rompnit, sagitt67, kmokhtar79, remuntada78, bilgerryan, mariozawa, txr33, thanhfhuongf, and2, talkingmonkeys, tamirda, venkat kamesh, RaKesh, renzetti.s, Adi Aisiteru Reborn, and a lot more, THANKS TO ALL!
Special thanks to Yuguo and all Aurora TEAM, darkera13, and Alemtro for all they do for us.
